attributes.action: Keep Kevin Keegan in his job as manager of Newcastle United Football Club
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition recognises the widespread public support for Kevin Keegan, and how much he means to Newcastle United fans. We believe that he is an asset to the club, the city and the wider community and express support for his continuation in the role of manager.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
